title: Tyranny
overview:
Tyranny is about a young artist and mathematician, Daniel McCarthy, who,
 after volunteering in a brain mapping experiment, begins seeing 
puzzling images he believes are visions of future events. Several years 
of repeated experiments cause his wife to leave him as he decends 
further into a maddening obsession to fit together pieces of a major 
global crisis about to occur. Eleven years and many crises later, he 
travels across the globe, leading a group of revolutionaries, known as 
the Strawman Underground, on a mission to out-maneuver the conspirators 
before they gain total control of the people.
